meanings.definition: Relating to ascension or rising upward.
meanings.sent1: The ascensional balloon floated gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The mountain climber felt the ascensional pull as he reached the summit.
meanings.sent3: The ascensional elevator seemed to have a mind of its own, going up and down randomly.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits took an ascensional journey after receiving the good news.
meanings.sent5: The ascensional music lifted everyone's mood at the concert.
